actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the fuel economy requirements under the gas guzzler tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase fuel economy requirements for purposes of the manufacturers' excise tax on gas guzzler automobiles. Specifies such increases for model years 1989, 1990, 1991, 1992, and 1993 and thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the fuel economy requirements under the gas guzzler tax.
